RecordVisibility (Pilot).name: RecordVisibility (Pilot)
RecordVisibility (Pilot).description: Represents the visibility attributes that determine a record’s read access.

VisibilityAttribute.description: The visibility attributes that determine the read access of a given record. For example, a user ID, parent record ID, or group ID.

RecordVisibility (Pilot).accessRules: pilot program. You must also have the “View All Data” or “Enable RecordVisibility API”
